# Source

https://rubygems.org/gems/rubyipmi/versions/0.6.0

# To build

* Get the gem
* Run gem2deb on the gem
* Replace `debian/` with this one in the source
* Cd into source
* `sudo pdebuild-<os>`

# Notes

* Needed on Wheezy, Squeeze, Precise
* Builds fine for Wheezy.
* Untested on Squeeze/Precise
